systemParameters.description: Default interest rate for motorbike loans (%/month)
Penalty interest rate applied to overdue principal (%/month)
Legal maximum annual interest rate cap in Vietnam (%). System warns when total rate exceeds this limit (per Civil Code 2015)
Management fee as percentage of loan amount (%)
Maximum LTV ratio for motorbike collateral (%)
Maximum LTV ratio for car collateral (%)
Maximum LTV ratio for gold collateral (%)
Minimum monthly income required for standard loans (VND)
Maximum allowed total installment = multiplier Ã— monthly income
Maximum number of active loans per customer
Maximum loan tenor allowed (months)
Maximum total outstanding across all loans per customer (VND)
Default display currency code
Default system timezone
Minimum age requirement for loan applicants
Whether to enable auto approval for low-risk loans
Maximum loan amount eligible for auto approval (VND)
Number of days before due date to send reminder
Number of days after overdue to send reminder
Max failed login attempts before account lock
